Unscathed.text: stands tall and confident, showing no sign of injury or fatigue.
looks ready for anything, completely unharmed.
moves gracefully, without any sign of damage.
glows with vitality, each movement precise and sharp.
shows no scratches or bruises, every action smooth and effortless.

Healthy.text: bears a few scratches, but their stance remains firm and steady.
has minor cuts but remains alert and prepared.
is slightly battered, yet continues to fight confidently.
shrugs off minor blows, showing no concern for the damage taken.
keeps moving with energy, lightly marked by the fight.

Scratched.text: has taken some minor cuts and bruises, yet still fights with vigor.
shows small scratches across their armor but remains determined.
has tiny wounds but continues to engage fiercely.
appears slightly marked but is far from weakened.

Bruised.text: shows the first signs of wear—strikes are beginning to take their toll.
takes hits that start to slow them down, but they keep going.
moves with some difficulty, evidence of recent blows visible.
flinches occasionally, but maintains a fighting stance.

Wounded.text: has blood seeping from the wounds. The movements are slower but still dangerous.
suffers from visible injuries, each move requires more effort.
grimaces with each strike, yet refuses to back down.
bleeds from several wounds, making every action count.

Injured.text: staggers slightly, struggling to maintain focus as the fight wears on.
moves with difficulty, clearly affected by the attacks.
breathing heavy, injuries clearly slowing down attacks.
takes careful steps, wounds making each motion taxing.

Bloodied.text: blood runs freely from the wounds. Every motion costing visible effort.
is soaked in blood but refuses to give in.
looks battered and crimson-stained, still trying to fight back.
struggles under the weight of injuries, yet eyes remain defiant.

Badly Wounded.text: sways on their feet, each breath shallow as they cling to survival.
is severely hurt, barely able to maintain balance.
every move is a struggle, injuries making attacks weak.
staggers dangerously, almost collapsing but fights on.

Grievously Wounded.text: is barely standing. Their willpower is the only thing keeping them in the fight...
teeters on the brink of collapse, fighting purely on determination.
struggles to stay upright, bloodied and exhausted.
moves almost unsteadily, survival driving their actions.

Dead.text: collapses to the ground, lifeless... Another one bites the dust...
falls motionless, defeated by the battle.
breath ceases, leaving the battlefield forever silent.
slumps to the floor, the fight finally over for them.
is gone, leaving an eerie stillness behind.
